================================
This is a documentation test
================================


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   installation
INSTALLATION
==============

To install this package, simply run the following command:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install this_project

This will install the package and all its dependencies.

If you want to install the package in development mode, run the following command:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install -e .

This will install the package and all its dependencies, but will also create a link to the package in the current folder.
This means that any changes you make to the package will be reflected in the installed package.
